blocks.name: cnlnadjlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ cnlnadji (Theorem 3.10 of [Beran] p. 104: every continuous linear operator has an adjoint). The value of the auxiliary functional ` G ` . (Contributed by NM, 16-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnlnadjlem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), co(cfv(c2, c0), csp, cv(s0))))
  -| wcel(c2, clo)
  -| wcel(c2, ccop)
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s1, chba, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), csp, cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), co(cfv(c2, c0), csp, cv(s0)))), wcel(c2, clo))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), co(cfv(c2, c0), csp, cv(s0)))), wcel(c2, ccop))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), co(cfv(c2, c0), csp, cv(s0)))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), co(cfv(c2, c0), csp, cv(s0)))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  fvmpt(s1, c0, chba, c1, co(cfv(c2, c0), csp, cv(s0)), co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), csp, cv(s0)))
  oveq1d(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), csp, cv(s0), cfv(c2, c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  fveq2(cv(s1), c0, c2)
  ovex(cfv(c2, c0), csp, cv(s0))
  diff.chba.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, cfv(c2, c0), csp, cv(s0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2, c0)
  diff.csp.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cnlnadjlem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ~H →(c1 ` c0)=((c2 ` c0)[.ih]s0))
  ⊣ c2 ∈ LinOp
  ⊣ c2 ∈ ContOp
  ⊣ c1 =(s1 ∈ ~H ↦((c2 ` s1)[.ih]s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ ~H →(c1 ` c0)=((c2 ` c0)[.ih]s0)), c2 ∈ LinOp)
  a1ii((c0 ∈ ~H →(c1 ` c0)=((c2 ` c0)[.ih]s0)), c2 ∈ ContOp)
  a1ii((c0 ∈ ~H →(c1 ` c0)=((c2 ` c0)[.ih]s0)), d(s0, c0))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ ~H →(c1 ` c0)=((c2 ` c0)[.ih]s0)), d(s0, c2))
  fvmpt(s1, c0, chba, c1, ((c2 ` c0)[.ih]s0), ((c2 ` s1)[.ih]s0))
  oveq1d((c2 ` s1), csp, s0, (c2 ` c0), s1 = c0)
  fveq2(s1, c0, c2)
  ovex((c2 ` c0), csp, s0)
  diff.chba.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, (c2 ` c0), csp, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2, c0)
  diff.csp.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

} = {

thm cnlnadjlem3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ ~H → c0 ∈ ~H)
  ⊣ c1 ∈ LinOp
  ⊣ c1 ∈ ContOp
  ⊣ c2 =(s1 ∈ ~H ↦((c1 ` s1)[.ih]s0))
  ⊣ c0 = iota(s2 ∈ ~H, ∀(s3 ∈ ~H,((c1 ` s3)[.ih]s0)=(s3[.ih]s2)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((s0 ∈ ~H → c0 ∈ ~H), d(s0, s2))
  a1ii((s0 ∈ ~H → c0 ∈ ~H), d(s1, s2))
  a1ii((s0 ∈ ~H → c0 ∈ ~H), d(s2, c1))
  a1ii((s0 ∈ ~H → c0 ∈ ~H), d(s3, c1))
  syl5eqel(c0, chba, iota(s2 ∈ ~H, ∀(s3 ∈ ~H,((c1 ` s3)[.ih]s0)=(s3[.ih]s2))), s0 ∈ ~H)
  syl(s0 ∈ ~H, iota(s2 ∈ ~H, ∀(s3 ∈ ~H,((c1 ` s3)[.ih]s0)=(s3[.ih]s2)))∈ ~H, ∃!(s2 ∈ ~H, ∀(s3 ∈ ~H,((c1 ` s3)[.ih]s0)=(s3[.ih]s2))))
  sylib(s0 ∈ ~H, ∃!(s2 ∈ ~H, ∀(s3 ∈ ~H,((c1 ` s3)[.ih]s0)=(s3[.ih]s2))), ∃!(s2 ∈ ~H, ∀(s3 ∈ ~H,(c2 ` s3)=(s3[.ih]s2))))
  syl(s0 ∈ ~H, ∃!(s2 ∈ ~H, ∀(s3 ∈ ~H,(c2 ` s3)=(s3[.ih]s2))), c2 ∈(LinFn ⋂ ContFn))
  sylibr(s0 ∈ ~H, c2 ∈(LinFn ⋂ ContFn), (c2 ∈ LinFn ∧ c2 ∈ ContFn))
  cnlnadjlem2(s0, s1, c2, c1)
  elin(c2, clf, ccnfn)
  riesz4(s2, s3, c2)
  reubii(s2, chba, ∀(s3 ∈ ~H,(c2 ` s3)=(s3[.ih]s2)), ∀(s3 ∈ ~H,((c1 ` s3)[.ih]s0)=(s3[.ih]s2)))
  ralbiia(s3, chba, (c2 ` s3)=(s3[.ih]s2), ((c1 ` s3)[.ih]s0)=(s3[.ih]s2))
  eqeq1d((c2 ` s3), (s3[.ih]s2), ((c1 ` s3)[.ih]s0), s3 ∈ ~H)
  cnlnadjlem1(s0, s1, s3, c2, c1)
  riotacl(s2, chba, ∀(s3 ∈ ~H,((c1 ` s3)[.ih]s0)=(s3[.ih]s2)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
  diff.chba.s(s2)
}

} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(c1, c0), chba)), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(c1, c0), chba)), diffsc(s1, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(c1, c0), chba)), diffsc(s2, c0))

  cnlnadjlem7(s0, s1, s2, s3, cv(hs0), c0, c1, c2, c3)

  breq2d(cfv(cno, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cle, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0))), co(cfv(cnop, c1), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cnop, c1)))
  oveq1(cv(hs1), cfv(cnop, c1), cmul, cfv(cno, cv(hs0)))

  breq2d((normh `(c0 ` hs0)), cle, (hs1[×](normh ` hs0)), ((normop ` c1)[×](normh ` hs0)), hs1 =(normop ` c1))

blocks.name: cnlnadji
blocks.content: Every continuous linear operator has an adjoint. Theorem 3.10 of [Beran] p. 104. (Contributed by NM, 18-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: adjbdlnb
blocks.content: An operator is bounded and linear iff its adjoint is. (Contributed by NM, 19-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

} = {
  impbii(wcel(c0, cbo), wcel(cfv(cado, c0), cbo))
  adjbdln(c0)
  mpancom(wcel(cfv(cado, c0), cbo), wcel(c0, cbo), wcel(c0, cdm(cado)))
  sylibr(wcel(cfv(cado, c0), cbo), wcel(c0, cdm(cado)), wcel(cfv(cado, c0), cdm(cado)))
  bdopadj(cfv(cado, c0))
  dmadjrnb(c0)
  eqeltrrd(c0, cbo, cfv(cado, cfv(cado, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cado)), wcel(cfv(cado, c0), cbo)))
  syl5eqr(cfv(cado, cfv(cado, c0)), c0, cfv(ccnv(cado), cfv(cado, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cado)), wcel(cfv(cado, c0), cbo)))
  fveq1i(ccnv(cado), cfv(cado, c0), cado)
  cnvadj()
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cado)), wcel(cfv(cado, c0), cbo)), wceq(cfv(ccnv(cado), cfv(cado, c0)), c0), wf1o(cado, cdm(cado), cdm(cado)), wcel(c0, cdm(cado)))
  adj1o()
  simpl(wcel(c0, cdm(cado)), wcel(cfv(cado, c0), cbo))
  f1ocnvfv1(cado, cdm(cado), cdm(cado), c0)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cdm(cado)), wcel(cfv(cado, c0), cbo), wcel(cfv(cado, cfv(cado, c0)), cbo))
  adjbdln(cfv(cado, c0))
}

} = {
  impbii(c0 ∈ BndLinOp, (adjh ` c0)∈ BndLinOp)
  adjbdln(c0)

  sylibr((adjh ` c0)∈ BndLinOp, c0 ∈ dom(adjh), (adjh ` c0)∈ dom(adjh))
  bdopadj((adjh ` c0))
  dmadjrnb(c0)
  eqeltrrd(c0, cbo, (adjh `(adjh ` c0)), (c0 ∈ dom(adjh)∧(adjh ` c0)∈ BndLinOp))
  syl5eqr((adjh `(adjh ` c0)), c0, (`' adjh `(adjh ` c0)), (c0 ∈ dom(adjh)∧(adjh ` c0)∈ BndLinOp))
  fveq1i(`' adjh, (adjh ` c0), cado)
  cnvadj()
  sylancr((c0 ∈ dom(adjh)∧(adjh ` c0)∈ BndLinOp), (`' adjh `(adjh ` c0))= c0, (adjh : dom(adjh)↔ dom(adjh)), c0 ∈ dom(adjh))
  adj1o()

  mp2an(((normop `(c0[+op]c1))[≤]((normop ` c0)[+](normop ` c1))↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H,((normh ` hs0)[≤]1 →(normh `((c0[+op]c1)` hs0))[≤]((normop ` c0)[+](normop ` c1))))), ((c0[+op]c1): ~H → ~H), ((normop ` c0)[+](normop ` c1))∈ ℝ*)

  letrd((normh `((c0[+op]c1)` hs0)), ((normop ` c0)[+](normop ` c1)), ((normh `(c0 ` hs0))[+](normh `(c1 ` hs0))), (hs0 ∈ ~H ∧(normh ` hs0)[≤]1))
  adantr(hs0 ∈ ~H, (normh ` hs0)[≤]1, (normh `((c0[+op]c1)` hs0))∈ ℝ)
  syl(hs0 ∈ ~H, (normh `((c0[+op]c1)` hs0))∈ ℝ, ((c0[+op]c1)` hs0)∈ ~H)
  hoscli(hs0, c0, c1)
  normcl(((c0[+op]c1)` hs0))
  adantr(hs0 ∈ ~H, (normh ` hs0)[≤]1, ((normh `(c0 ` hs0))[+](normh `(c1 ` hs0)))∈ ℝ)
  readdcld((normh `(c0 ` hs0)), (normh `(c1 ` hs0)), hs0 ∈ ~H)
  a1i((hs0 ∈ ~H ∧(normh ` hs0)[≤]1), ((normop ` c0)[+](normop ` c1))∈ ℝ)

  fveq2d(cno, ((c0[+op]c1)` hs0), ((c0 ` hs0)[+h](c1 ` hs0)), hs0 ∈ ~H)
  mp3an12(hs0 ∈ ~H, ((c0[+op]c1)` hs0)=((c0 ` hs0)[+h](c1 ` hs0)), (c0 : ~H → ~H), (c1 : ~H → ~H))
  hosval(c0, c1, hs0)
  syl2anc(hs0 ∈ ~H, (normh `((c0 ` hs0)[+h](c1 ` hs0)))[≤]((normh `(c0 ` hs0))[+](normh `(c1 ` hs0))), (c0 ` hs0)∈ ~H, (c1 ` hs0)∈ ~H)
  norm-ii((c0 ` hs0), (c1 ` hs0))
  mp2and((hs0 ∈ ~H ∧(normh ` hs0)[≤]1), ((normh `(c0 ` hs0))[+](normh `(c1 ` hs0)))[≤]((normop ` c0)[+](normop ` c1)), (normh `(c0 ` hs0))[≤](normop ` c0), (normh `(c1 ` hs0))[≤](normop ` c1))
  mp3an1(hs0 ∈ ~H, (normh ` hs0)[≤]1, (normh `(c0 ` hs0))[≤](normop ` c0), (c0 : ~H → ~H))
  nmoplb(c0, hs0)

  nmopre(c0)
  ax-mp((normop ` c1)∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ BndLinOp)
  nmopre(c1)
  le2add((normh `(c0 ` hs0)), (normh `(c1 ` hs0)), (normop ` c0), (normop ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c((c0[+op]c1))
  diff.hs0.c(((normop ` c0)[+](normop ` c1)))

blocks.name: bdophsi
blocks.content: The sum of two bounded linear operators is a bounded linear operator. (Contributed by NM, 9-Mar-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bdophsi(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wcel(co(c0, chos, c1), cbo)
  -| wcel(c0, cbo)
  -| wcel(c1, cbo)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wcel(co(c0, chos, c1), cbo), wcel(co(c0, chos, c1), clo), wcel(cfv(cnop, co(c0, chos, c1)), cr))
  lnophsi(c0, c1)
  ax-mp(wcel(c0, clo), wcel(c0, cbo))
  bdopln(c0)
  ax-mp(wcel(c1, clo), wcel(c1, cbo))
  bdopln(c1)
  mp4an(wcel(cfv(cnop, co(c0, chos, c1)), cr), wcel(cfv(cnop, co(c0, chos, c1)), cxr), wcel(co(cfv(cnop, c0), caddc, cfv(cnop, c1)), cr), wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(cnop, co(c0, chos, c1))), wbr(cfv(cnop, co(c0, chos, c1)), cle, co(cfv(cnop, c0), caddc, cfv(cnop, c1))))
  ax-mp(wcel(cfv(cnop, co(c0, chos, c1)), cxr), wf(co(c0, chos, c1), chba, chba))
  nmopxr(co(c0, chos, c1))
  readdcli(cfv(cnop, c0), cfv(cnop, c1))
  ax-mp(wcel(cfv(cnop, c0), cr), wcel(c0, cbo))
  nmopre(c0)
  ax-mp(wcel(cfv(cnop, c1), cr), wcel(c1, cbo))
  nmopre(c1)
  ax-mp(wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(cnop, co(c0, chos, c1))), wf(co(c0, chos, c1), chba, chba))
  hoaddcli(c0, c1)
  ax-mp(wf(c0, chba, chba), wcel(c0, cbo))
  bdopf(c0)
  ax-mp(wf(c1, chba, chba), wcel(c1, cbo))
  bdopf(c1)
  nmopgtmnf(co(c0, chos, c1))
  nmoptrii(c0, c1)
  xrre(cfv(cnop, co(c0, chos, c1)), co(cfv(cnop, c0), caddc, cfv(cnop, c1)))
  elbdop2(co(c0, chos, c1))
}

  nmopre(c1)
  ax-mp(-∞[<](normop `(c0[+op]c1)), ((c0[+op]c1): ~H → ~H))
